title: Dogeza, Shite Kudasai.
sinopse: 1-3. Dogeza, Shite Kudasai. 4. Chuubou no Momoyama-san (Momoyama-san from the Kitchen) 5. Massugu na Yugami (A Straightforward Distortion) 6. Sotsugyou no Hi (Graduation Day) 7. Yawaraka na Ego (A Soft Ego) 8. Hito no Iru Basho (A Place Where People Are) 9. Kumo no Ito (A Spider's Thread)
